title: FDT
name: Frame Due Time
definition: Provides special handling instructions for the connection, disconnection or coordination of changes for this request.
fieldNotes: Types of changes that require coordination are CIC redirects, switch conversions, mutual trunkin g arrangement, point code changes, traffic rehome/reroutes, call through testing requests, cut over, etc.

validEntryNotes:
Indicates the time zone and time or time zone and w indow of time when the service should be connected, disconnected or coordinated. 
When this field is populated in con j unction with the CB TEL NO field, a specific time of day including the hour or hour and minute is required.
usageNotes:
Required when the first position of the REQTYP type is "M" or "L", the ACT field is "N", "C", or "D", and routing and/or translation change requires coordination. 
Prohibited when ACT field is "R". 
Required when the CB TEL NO is populated. 
Otherwise optional.
